put.summary:
Make sure BMM knows an authenticated user.
This method has to be called when you receive 417 errors (ExpectationFailed).

417.description: User has not been created yet and you have to call PUT /CurrentUser first.

get.summary:
List of playlists.
The apps use this endpoint to load single playlists as well (as optimization)
Get a list of track collections for the current user.

201.description: Successfully created the track collection. Returns the id of the new item in a header.

get.summary: Get a single track collection. All hidden or deleted tracks will not show up in this list if the user added them once.

post.summary: Add tracks to existing track collection without changing anything else
Resets the sharing link and removes all followers of the track collection

400.description: Requesting user is not following the playlist
